attributes.additional_details: A General Election would hopefully give enough of a majority to which ever government to finish brexit either way as its been delayed long enough. The consistent uncertainty and delays are doing nobody any favours.
attributes.background: Whether you voted remain or leave 3 years ago, the current government no longer holds a majority, Surely this would mean nothing will now get decided due to party conflicts and the country on a whole is embarrassed by the governments indesivicness.
